name: Bitcoin Cat
description: Welcome to our unique platform ​dedicated to the legacy and ​continuing influence of $SASHA, the ​legendary cat who belonged to ​@lensassaman (widely speculated to ​be Satoshi Nakamoto, founder of ​Bitcoin). $SASHA symbolizes the mysterious ​and pioneering spirit of Bitcoin's ​inception. She lived with Len Sassaman, a ​pivotal figure in cryptographic ​freedom who played a vital role in ​shaping digital privacy and ​cryptocurrency.
